issue.title: [CF 1179] lua code to remove buff on icon rightclick
issue.body:
Ive looked through the wowapi and found "CancelUnitBuff("unit", buffIndex or "spell" [,"filter" or "rank"]);". How can i use that as custom lua code to rightclick the icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user Drozo_Qoocla | Imported from CurseForge issue #1179 | Raw
